laboratory_examinations.findings: High levels of lipopolysaccharide-induced production of interleukin-1β and interleukin-6 but impaired release of TNF-α.
Identified a 4 bp deletion (c.603–606delCAGA) in exon 5 of ADAM17.
Absence of ADAM17 expression in PBMCs and keratinocytes from the affected boy; ADAM17 expression present in controls and unaffected mother.
Paucity of ADAM17 expression in skin and small intestine from the affected boy compared to controls.
